unnormalised: In yesterday's IPL match, CSK beat MI by 6 wickets. MI scored 157/7 in 20 overs, with Rohit Sharma top-scoring at 48 runs. CSK chased it down in 18.3 overs.

unnormalised: Ravindra Jadeja was declared Man of the Match for his spell of 2/22 and a quickfire 32 not out. It was a pretty exciting finish, with Dhoni hitting the winning runs. The crowd went wild, man!
